#text=I made an appointment a week before I wanted to get my hair cut at a local salon .
#text=I showed up about 10 minutes before my scheduled appointment .
#text=When I arrived , I immediately went to the front desk to let the receptionist know that I was there .
#text=She told me that she would let my stylist know .
#text=About five minutes later , Elena , my hairdresser approached me .
#text=We went to her stylist chair and she looked and felt my hair .
#text=She asked me how I would like my hair cut today .
#text=I told her that I wanted the length trimmed about 1\/2 inch and some layers added to increase fullness in my thin hair .
#text=We went over to the sink and she started to wash my hair .
#text=She wet it with warm water , lathered it up with a fragrant shampoo and finished by adding a deep conditioning treatment .
#text=Elena placed a warm towel around my wet hair and we walked back to her chair .
#text=She combed out my hair and then began cutting .
#text=It took about 15 minutes for her to finish cutting it and making sure it was all even .
#text=Afterwards , she dried and styled my hair .
#text=I thanked her for doing a wonderful job and then went to the front desk to pay for her services .
#text=There is a place to leave individual tips for each stylist .
#text=I left her a 20 % tip and also scheduled my next hair cut appointment .
